column4: U.S. toymaker Hasbro makes new approach to buy Mattel: source
column5: Hasbro Inc  has made an approach to acquire rival Mattel Inc   a source familiar with the matter said on Friday  the latest attempt to combine the two biggest U.S. toymakers in more than two decades.

column4: Boeing sees steady Gulf demand  interest in mid-sized jet
column5: DUBAI Boeing  sought to dispel concerns about a slowdown in the growth of Gulf airlines as the aerospace industry gathered on Saturday for the Dubai Airshow.

column4: Deutsche Bank picks asset-management IPO bookrunners -source
column5: FRANKFURT  Nov 11 Deutsche Bank has selected Barclays  Citigroup and Credit Suisse as senior bookrunners for the initial public offering (IPO) of its asset-management arm  a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Saturday.

column4: Exclusive: Equity Commonwealth approaches Forest City about merging - sources
column5: Equity Commonwealth   a U.S. real estate investment trust (REIT) focused on office space and chaired by property mogul Sam Zell  has approached Forest City Realty Trust Inc  to discuss a possible merger  people familiar with the matter said.
